name: Thoughts and Prayers
description:
You are a Congressman just trying to get home after a long day of not doing a damn thing about gun violence. The problem is all these grieving families and ghosts of victims keep getting in the way!  

This game is unfortunately always topical in America. 

Please let me know what you think! Also, if you want to see moar levels.

CONTROLS
WASD or arrow keys to move. 
Space to jump.
